mapper.insert: insert into qna (num, title, contents, writer, hit, regDate, ref, step, depth) values (0, #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, 0, now(), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where num=#{num}
update qna set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from qna order by num desc
